solution_line_template: A pound of cream cheese cost ${cheddar_price} / {cream_cheese_divisor} = $<<{cheddar_price}/{cream_cheese_divisor}={cream_cheese_price}>>{cream_cheese_price}.
A pack of cold cuts cost ${cheddar_price} x {cold_cuts_multiplier} = $<<{cheddar_price}*{cold_cuts_multiplier}={cold_cuts_price}>>{cold_cuts_price}.
